description: Describing server-side stored product impressions, i.e. products that were returned from the backend (both api and web)

impression_context.description: Denoting where the customer have seen the products (deprecated)

campaign_type.description: If present, describes the campaign type of the impression (deprecated)

products.description: The product IDs in the impression

campaigns.description: The campaign IDs for the products in the impression (deprecated)

site_type.description: The site where products are shown (e.g. category page, campaign page)

site_id.description: The unique id for the site type. If nothing applies, set to -1
